1438016044304637954.text: My colleagues asked for other seemingly innocuous things that the Democrats simply could not support.

1438015971671875585.text: All of us have things we care about and reasons we wanted to serve on this important committee, my amendment attempted to reign in spending if inflation was too high- to prevent causing a further spike and wreaking havoc on our economy- denied.

1438015872510185472.text: More hours, more votes strictly down party lines. Republican amendments, even things that should be bipartisan like stopping child labor were voted down because an R beside the name was simply too much to bear.

1438015806508515330.text: Another Congress, another fight about California’s bloated, over budget high speed rail system. Democrats will say they want to use the budget for human infrastructure- but not at the expense of their pet projects that cost billions.

1438015721871659016.text: Were the most contentious fights about a major highway? A huge bridge renovation? No, it was about spending $200 million for a park in Speaker Pelosi’s home district.

1438015614036160513.text: Some things should not be political- highways, bridges, runways, but in Biden’s America, everything is political. So today(yesterday), for 14 hours, we argued about infrastructure.
